tour.hero.title: Welcome to Bóc Mệnh!
tour.hero.description: This is where you begin your journey of self-discovery and mystical exploration. Learn about your destiny!
tour.features.title: Main Features
tour.features.description: Explore tools for destiny decoding, from dream interpretation, numerology to Tarot cards and Feng Shui.
tour.luckybox.title: Lucky Box
tour.luckybox.description: Open your lucky box daily to receive your lucky number and a special message just for you.
tour.featuredProducts.title: Featured Products
tour.featuredProducts.description: Discover specially curated Feng Shui products designed to bring luck and prosperity into your life.
